ygData.msgSnippet: i ve seen boots for 2k or 3k, personally I only think they re worth about 1.5k Draelon ... From: RKR [mailto:rkroads@yahoo.com] Sent: Saturday, May 20, 2000
ygData.messageBody:
i've seen boots for 2k or 3k, personally I only think they're worth about
1.5k

Draelon

-----Original Message-----
From: RKR [mailto:rkroads@...]
Sent: Saturday, May 20, 2000 2:32 PM
To: eqbards@egroups.com
Subject: [eqbards] Singing Steel


I am starting to see people sell it. Someone was asking 5k for the boots.
Anyone
else seeing prices?

Hehe I have to think to myself: if I sold my fishbone earring and bought a
pair of
Singing Steel gauntlets (not as good as getting them mind you, and I have
been
hanging around Karnor lately ;P) then what other bauble could I also get?
For me or
my baby cleric ;P.

Maravana Vireo
51 Bard of Jus Divinum, who bled plenty for each of the 4 pieces of imbrued
she
wears
Mithaniel Marr
